articles.description: Investors can subscribe to the DCX Systems IPO by betting for a lot of 72 shares or in multiples thereof. At the upper range of the price band, one lot of the IPO is worth Rs 14,904. A retail bidder can bid for 13 lots or 936 shares at maximum.

articles.title: Ashish Kacholia adds stake in these 2 smallcaps in September quarter - Economic Times
articles.description: Garware Hi-Tech was initially in the business of trading imported cars. Later, the company began polyester film manufacturing. Currently, the company is the leading manufacturer, supplier of high-quality, durable, and highly tensile polyester films internatio…
articles.content:
